website_summaries.verdict: The Philips Fidelio DS3510 strikes an easy middle-ground as an unobtrusive, broadly compatible speaker dock with a decent sound for its size.
pros: The Philips Fidelio DS3510 portable speaker dock works with your iPhone, iPod, or iPad using its charging dock or a wireless Bluetooth connection
cons: The angle of the dock connection makes it difficult to use with the iPad 2, and its upward-projecting sound puts the sonic sweet spot on your ceiling

customer_reviews.title: Bought for College Dorm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker so that I could listen to music on my ipod and hear it when brushing my teeth. This thing is AMAZING!! My dorm room is very small and I don't even take it past the "starting" volume. I already know it can be heard through the walls! It's awesome! Great product and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Turns off for no reason
customer_reviews.text: Have had it and enjoyed for two months now it turns off for no reason. It plays for about 10 or 15 minutes and just shuts off. Everything is plugged in and attached properly. It does it with my iPod and iPad so it's not a setting issue. Just to be sure, I reset everything and it still does it. Unfortunately, amazon will only give a partial refund with shipping at my cost. $100.00 paperweight! Extremely disappointed and won't but ant electronics from amazon again due to this horrible return policy!

customer_reviews.title: Has More Features than I Can Use
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with this product's speaker quality and have really failed to utilize it to its full potential. My overwhelming use of this product has been as an IPOD docking station so I can listen to music while I'm at my desk. Unlike scores of cheap IPOD docking products, this one sounds quite good although I don't qualify as an audio snob. Now that I've purchased an IPAD and have a bluetooth capable phone and other wireless devices, I'm going to explore using this more, but overall, I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: John Standiford

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Robust, full-bodied sound in such a small device! I love how easy it is use -- plug it in (or run it on battery power), attach your iPod or iPad and you're off and running. I'm using mine with an iPod nano 3G and an iPod Touch 4G, and I couldn't be happier. Love the sleek look, too; it can sit on my nightstand permanently without looking bulky or obtrusive in regard to the general room design. And the fact that it connects to the pc via usb, means updating your iPod is extremely easy. Love, love, love this.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D. Couillard

You have to download an app for it to work, but it is free. It is lightweight and easily transportable. I've used it at a friends house since getting it and it worked out perfectly. Straightforward instructions are always nice. It charges your device while hooked up which is a plus.

product_meta.title: Philips Fidelio Docking Speaker iPod, iPhone and iPad, DS3510
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Go wireless with Bluetooth streaming and get more out of your music, gaming, and video experience with the Philips Fidelio DS3510 Speaker. This compact, elegant, portable speaker charges and plays your iPod/iPhone/iPad and lets you connect and sync it to your computer via the included USB cable. Neodymium construction provides crystal-clear sound, Bluetooth ensures superb gaming sound effects, and shielding technology blocks cell phone interference. Flexible power options mean you can take this speaker on the go (portable) or keep it set up on a desk or nightstand to rock your space.

FIDELIO DS3510 SPEAKER
 * Compact speaker docking station provides crystal-clear sound
 * Neodymium construction for optimum bass response and pure, balanced audio
 * Shielding technology blocks mobile phone interference
 * Synchronizes with your computer via the included USB cable
 * One-year warranty



High style meets hi fidelity with this iPad/iPhone/iPod Docking system.
View larger.NEODYMIUM CONSTRUCTION FOR RICH, BALANCED SOUND
The DS3510 has been engineered to deliver crisp, detailed sound that will satisfy even the most discerning listeners. Thanks to its neodymium magnets, the speaker is able to produce pure sound with superior bass response. Highs, mids, and lows are all rendered in exquisite detail, so you can hear your music as it was meant to be heard.

The speaker also features special shielding technology, which helps block mobile phone interference when receiving phone calls.

BASS-ENHANCING TECHNOLOGY FOR BOOMING AUDIO
The DS3510 provides incredible sound. If you prefer your music with a kick, you can activate Dynamic Bass Boost (DBB) with the touch of a button. DBB helps emphasize the bass content of music, allowing you to feel the "thump" of the bass even when the volume is low. Precisely tuned bass pipes make for deep, tight bass production. The result is richer, more robust sound at all volumes.

AMAZING GAME SOUND EFFECTS WITH BLUETOOTH
Superb gaming sound effects via Bluetooth keep things exciting. Hear all the sounds loud and clear and boost your experience to new levels. Simply make the wireless Bluetooth connection between your portable device and the docking speaker, and play away.

COMPUTER SYNCHRONIZATION
The DS3510 charges your iPod, iPhone, or iPad while it's docked, so your device is ready when you are. While charging, it can synchronize with your computer via a USB cable for access to your entire iTunes library. For added versatility, the speaker also includes an aux-in port for connection to a variety of other electronic devices.

TAKE IT WITH YOU
Designed to fit any space and lifestyle, the DS3510 is portable and can be battery powered (4 AA batteries not included) for portability or plugged in via the included AC adapter.

FREE FIDELIO APP UNLOCKS ADDITIONAL FEATURES
If you own an iPod Touch, iPhone or iPad, you can unlock even more features for your docking speaker using the complementary Fidelio app. The Philips Fidelio app lets you control your speaker dock's acoustic properties, access 7000+ free internet radio stations, share music you are listening to with friends via facebook and twitter, set alarms to wake to your favorite music, photo or weather conditions and much more using your iPhone, iPod touch or iPad.

DOCK ANY IPHONE, IPOD, OR IPAD, EVEN IN ITS CASE
The DS3510's spring-loaded docking port accommodates any iPhone, iPod, or iPad without special adapters. What's more, it works even when most protective cases are on--just dock your iPhone/iPod/iPad as is for fuss-free enjoyment of your music.

COMPATIBLE WITH MOST IPAD, IPAD 2, IPHONES, AND IPODS
The DS3510 is compatible with all iPod products with 30-pin connectors (except iPod shuffle)--this includes the newest iPod nano and touch models. It is also compatible with iPhone, iPhone 3G, iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPad, and iPad 2.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
DS3510 Docking Speaker, AC adapter, 3.5-millimeter auxiliary cable, USB cable, and manual.
